title: cultural_data_The_Mind_Museum_TMM
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.megamobile.themindmuseum.
Application Name: The Mind Museum TMM.
Number of Reviews: 75.00.
Application Description: The Mind Museum makes ​science come alive on your phone or tablet​!​​Begin your journey of wonder now!​ Access exclusive content about each exhibit by snapping a picture of their QR codes, and spark your curiosity by answering some mind-starting questions.Take the museum home with you! Read our experiment guide, a collection of some of our favorite experiments for you to do at home or in school. You can also learn a new science fact each day!The Mind Museum is​ ​a non-profit, award-winning science museum located in Bonifacio Global City, Taguig. It is dedicated to providing an extraordinary educational experience that inspires the public understanding of science.Read moreCollapse.
